notes: Rebuilding strength. Keep intensity manageable. Efficiency over volume.

exercises.name: Barbell Back Squat
exercises.progressionNote: Build to 3x8 at 185 before adding load. Then 195lb for 3x5.

exercises.name: Pull-Up
exercises.notes: Rebuilding capacity - just accumulate good reps

exercises.name: Ring Support Hold
exercises.progressionNote: Build to 3x60s before ring dip eccentrics
exercises.customCue: Try figure-8 weight shifts for variety

exercises.name: Two-Leg Hamstring Slide
exercises.progressionNote: Progress to 1-leg eccentric when 3x10 is easy and confident
cues: Lie on back, heels on sliders
Bridge up, slide heels in and out

exercises.name: Wall Handstand Pushup
exercises.progressionNote: Build to 3x8, then add deficit or move to freestanding eccentrics

exercises.name: Ring Row
exercises.progressionNote: Lower rings / increase angle as reps build. Target: horizontal archer rows 3x8
cues: Body straight from head to heels
exercises.notes: Adjust angle to hit target reps

exercises.name: Push-Up
exercises.progressionNote: Progress to archer or ring push-ups when 3x15 is easy
